S.FORM: Yin-cu-mincu-way-yin-huwey Yin-cu-mincu-weyin-huwey (sapuru han a panganga –Yin-min-huwey) u miebaway, u mipadamaay tu demak nu masaniyaniyaru'ay a tarakaway a Seyhu nu mita i Taywan. Na i 1996 a miheca tu sabaw tusa a bulad a nipatireng. U miebaway, u padamaay tu masama:anay a demakan nu yin-cu-min i Sey-hu. Pi'arawan to lakaw 原住民族委員會

Yin-co-minco-way-yin-howey Yin-co-minco-weyin-howey (saporo han a panganga –Yin-min-howey) o miebaway, o mipadamaay to demak no masaniyaniyaro'ay a tarakaway a Seyho no mita i Taywan. Na i 1996 a miheca to sabaw tosa a bolad a nipatireng. U miebaway, o padamaay to masama:anay a demakan no yin-co-min i Sey-ho. Pi'arawan to lakaw 原住民族委員會
